snippet.title: FLATLAND Vol.2 | PS4, Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
#QUByteConnect2020
FLATLAND - Vol. 2 is a fast-paced hardcore platformer featuring hand-crafted levels and Lightning-fast respawns. Help Square in crossing the most dangerous part of Flatland: the flooded wells.

About QUByte Interactive
QUByte Interactive is a Brazilian game developer and publisher focused on delivering high quality experiences across the most diverse platforms, from mobile to PC to Video game consoles, with business partners in several countries such as USA, Canada, Germany, Japan and China.

About Minimol Games
Minimol Games Is a Brazilian game developer focused on high quality games with minimalist aesthetic.
All rights reserved © 2020 QUByte Interactive.
